item.title: About
item.description: Currently I am currently working as a Senior IT Security Engineer at ConnectedCare GmbH (Berlin/Telgte, Germany, formerly Bewatec GmbH), where I significantly contribute to the IT security of the ConnectedCare platform and serve as the contact person for all topics related to IT security & data protection. My activities address two important areas: a) technical security and b) regulatory activities. Both areas interact closely (e.g. fulfilling vulnerability management for the Cyber Resilience Act or risk management for NIS-2) and must always be planned together.
